title: What are people who don't believe in souls called? - Quora

response.answer_text: People who don’t believe in souls don’t have a single group name (people that don’t believe in gods do). Skeptics, naturalists, philosophical monists, rationally enlightened people,… generally don’t accept souls as a valid concept (and thus don’t believe in it). But that is a mere subset.

they are called “normal” “well being” “ healthy” they don’t believe in souls and they believe in death.
